content: I noticed that if you enter the exact package ID as a search term in the registry, you don't alway get a match. Thus, if I search for "smart4health.eu.core", I get zero matches (though the package with that ID is listed). On the other hand, a search for the IPS package ID "hl7.fhir.uv.ips" does give a match. Searching on related terms (e.g. just "smart4health") works, but it might be confusing if the exact ID is not recognized. Is there some way to tweak the indexing to make this always work?
